summary: "The Road" is a 2006 novel by American author Cormac McCarthy, set in a post-apocalyptic world where a disaster has destroyed most of life and civilization. It follows a father and son on a tough journey across a desolate landscape. The book won big awards, including the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction in 2007. In 2009, it was made into a movie directed by John Hillcoat.
title: The Road
